default.heading: Basic
default.text: The map takes an array of pins. Each pin needs latitude (lat) and longitude (lng). The result is a basic map with pins on each location.

icon.heading: With icon
icon.text: Adding the icon key to the pins array lets you set colors and icons.

tooltip.heading: With icon & tooltip
tooltip.text: Adding the tooltip key to the pins array lets you set a tooltip that pops up when the pin is clicked.
